name: qbittorrent
description: qBittorrent is a free and open-source BitTorrent client with a built-in search engine, sequential downloading, integrated RSS, and remote control via web UI. It runs on all major desktop platforms.
features: Built-in search: Query multiple torrent sites simultaneously from the application without opening a browser.
Sequential downloading: Download files in order for streaming media while the torrent is still active.
RSS automation: Subscribe to RSS feeds and automatically download matching torrents based on filters.
Web UI: Control downloads remotely through a responsive web interface accessible from any device.
Bandwidth scheduling: Set upload and download speed limits based on time of day to manage network usage.
IP filtering: Block or allow connections from specific IP ranges to enhance privacy and security.
Torrent creation: Build and share your own torrent files with custom trackers and piece sizes.
Category management: Organize torrents into categories with separate save paths and rules.
Proxy support: Route traffic through SOCKS5 or HTTP proxies for anonymous downloading.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with community-developed search plugins for additional torrent sources.
Encryption support: Enable protocol encryption to bypass ISP throttling and improve privacy.
Cross-platform: Run on Windows, macOS, and Linux with consistent features and interface across all platforms.
